snippet: A comparison of men given antibiotics for urinary tract infections found a higher risk of recurrence among those who took the medicines for more than a week.
abstract: A comparison of men given antibiotics for urinary tract infections found a higher risk of recurrence among those who took the medicines for more than a week.

headline.main: Doubts on Treatment for Urinary Infection
headline.print_headline: Prognosis: Doubts on Treatment for Urinary Infection
